name: Physics Fighters
description:
Physics Fighters is a smash bros like fighting game, where you don't have an attack button per se, but instead you use physics to spin fast and deal more damage!

Game Notes:

1. On the character select screen move your cursor over the character you want to select and press the start button (F/G for keyboard). And then you can fight.
To choose random hit start before a character is selected.

Controls of the game:

------Keyboard------

Player 1:
Left/Right: A/D
Jump: W
Fast-Fall: S
Start: F

Player 2:
Left/Right: Left Arrow/Right Arrow
Jump: Up Arrow
Fast-Fall: Down Arrow
Start: G

------PS4 Controller------

Player 1:
Left/Right: Left Joystick
Jump: Triangle
Fast-Fall: Down On Left Joystick
Start: Options

Player 2:
Left/Right: Left Joystick
Jump: Triangle
Fast-Fall: Down On Left Joystick
Start: Options

------Xbox360 Controller------

Player 1:
Left/Right: Left Joystick
Jump: Y Button
Fast-Fall: Down On Left Joystick
Start: Right Joystick Click

Player 2:
Left/Right: Left Joystick
Jump: Y Button
Fast-Fall: Down On Left Joystick
Start: Right Joystick Click
